## Hi! Welcome!

I created this website to share my interests, skills, and experiences, academic, professional, and otherwise.

### About me

I was born and raised in Half Moon Bay, CA. My love of the outdoors is what lead me to pursue a degree in environmental studies. I have many interests within the field of environmental studies, including wildlife conservation, glaciers, and climate change. In my free time, you can find me outside, hiking, running, playing frisbe with my dog, surfing, or backpacking. Or passionatley wacthign basketball! Go Warrior
